text: Anata gata wa, nise shinja-tachi no koto de, dōshite 2-ha ni wakareta no ka. Arrā wa kare-ra no okonai no tame ni, kare-ra o (fushinjin ni) tenraku sa se raretade wanai ka. Anata gata wa, arrā ga mayowa se rareta mono o michibikou to nozomu no ka. Hontōni arrā ga mayowa se rareta mono ni wa, kesshite michi o miidasenaidearou
